ConfigurationGroup.title: Pay Per Rental
ConfigurationGroup.description: Configuration Settings For The Pay Per Rental Extension

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_ENABLED.title: Enable Pay Per Rentals
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_ENABLED.description: Enable or disable the pay per rental extension

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_SHOW_CALENDAR_.title: Show reservation calendar on product Info page
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_SHOW_CALENDAR_.description: If false it will show the reservation calendar on a separate page.

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_NUMBER_OF_MONT.title: How many months should be shown by default
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_NUMBER_OF_MONT.description: How many months should be shown by default on the build reservation calendar page

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_ALLOW_OVERBOOK.title: Allow Overbooking
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_ALLOW_OVERBOOK.description: Allow overbooking for pay per rentals without inventory

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_DATE_SELECTION.value: Using calendar after browsing products and clicking Reserve
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_DATE_SELECTION.title: Reservation Dates Selection
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_DATE_SELECTION.set_function: tep_cfg_select_option(array('Using calendar after browsing products and clicking Reserve','Using calendar start/end dates before browsing products'),

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_LENGTH_METHOD.title: Reservation Length Method
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_LENGTH_METHOD.description:
This will set how the reservation length is determined and only applies to reservations less than 1 month:
First: First Day = 1 Day
Last: Last Day = 1 Day
Both: First And Last = 2 Days
None: First And Last = 0 Days

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_CHOOSE_PICKUP.title: Allowing customer to choose pickup location?
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_CHOOSE_PICKUP.description: Customer is allowed to choose pickup location(Must have Inventory Centers Extension)

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_CHOOSE_DROPOFF.title: Allowing customer to choose dropoff location?
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_CHOOSE_DROPOFF.description: Customer is allowed to choose dropoff location(Must have Inventory Centers Extension)

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_ENABLE_TIME.title: Enable pickup/dropoff time of day?
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_ENABLE_TIME.description: Customer is allowed to choose pickup/dropoff Time of the day(Store hours)

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_START_TIME.title: Store hour when rental is allowed. Basically open store time.

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_END_TIME.title: Store hour when rental is denied. Basically close store time.

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_TIME_INCREMENT.title: Time Increments.
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_TIME_INCREMENT.description: How is time incremented in the dropdown for selecting time

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_SHOW_STOCK.title: Show reserve button in product listing for products that aren't in stock for their reservation dates if "Using calendar start/end dates before browsing products" is set ?
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_SHOW_STOCK.description: If set to true it will allow overbooking.

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_AUTO_SEND.title: Auto send reservations on date they should be sent instead of using send reservations page

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_AUTO_RETURN.title: Auto return reservations on date they should be returned instead of using return reservations page

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_USE_EVENTS.title: Use events instead of start/end dates
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_USE_EVENTS.description: If the ppr dates beggining is enabled and use events is enabled dates will be replaced by events.

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_USE_SHIP.title: Use ship methods
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_USE_SHIP.description: Use ship methods in the ppr box

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_SHOW_VIEW_ALL_.title: Show View all button on the infobox
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_SHOW_VIEW_ALL_.description: In reservations dates beginning infobox show "View Products" button that links to view all products, or instead the product categories.

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_CHECK_GOOGLE_Z.title: Check Google zones before selecting shipping methods
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_CHECK_GOOGLE_Z.description: If reservation before is selected the shipping methods will be filtered by google zone.

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_DATE_PADDING.title: Start date padding
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_DATE_PADDING.description: Number of days to add to current date. Before this date no reservation can be done.

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_DIFFERENT_SHIP.title: Different shipping methods on order
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_DIFFERENT_SHIP.description: On one order cannot be different shipping methods.

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_SHOW_LOS_SUCCE.title: Show level of service details on checkout success page
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_SHOW_LOS_SUCCE.description: Show level of service details on checkout success page

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_SHOW_EVENT_SUC.title: Show event details on checkout success page
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_SHOW_EVENT_SUC.description: Show event details on checkout success page

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_SHOW_EVENT_EMA.title: Show event description on email success
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_SHOW_EVENT_EMA.description: Show event description on email success

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_SHOW_TERMS_EMA.title: Show terms and conditions on email success
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_SHOW_TERMS_EMA.description: Show terms and conditions on email success

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_INSURE_ALL_PRO.title: Only all products on the order can be insured
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_INSURE_ALL_PRO.description: If false products can be insured separated on the order

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_SHOW_PRICES_DA.title: Show prices for rentals when date before is selected.
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_SHOW_PRICES_DA.description: Show prices for rentals when date before is selected.

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_SHOW_EVENT_AS_.title: Show Event on search and as column on order page
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_SHOW_EVENT_AS_.description: If events are enabled it will show a search box and a column with events on orders page.

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_SHOW_LOS_AS_CO.title: Show Level of Service as column on order page
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_SHOW_LOS_AS_CO.description: If Shipping is enabled it will show a column with level of service options on orders page

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_TAX_PER_EVENT_.title: Setup tax based on event address
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_TAX_PER_EVENT_.description: Choose shipping methods for which event address is used for tax.

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_MIN_RENTAL_DAY.title: Minimum rental days
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_MIN_RENTAL_DAY.description: Minimum rental days allowed per product

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_USE_GLOBAL_MIN.title: Use minimum rental days global
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_USE_GLOBAL_MIN.description: If false it will use minimum rental days per product.

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_USE_UPS_RESERV.title: Use ups shipping module for reservation
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_USE_UPS_RESERV.description: If true zonereservation will be replaced by ups methods.

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_FORCE_START_DA.title: Force the start date to be "today"
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_FORCE_START_DA.description: If "True" then the current date will automatically be selected as the start date

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_ALLOW_HOURLY.title: Allow Hourly selection and display of dates on the store
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_ALLOW_HOURLY.description: If "True" then all the dates on the store will have time added and you will can select hour rentals

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_ALLOW_DISCOUNT.title: Allow discounts based on the price of the rentals
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_ALLOW_DISCOUNT.description: If "True" then all the dates on the store will have time added and you will can select hour rentals

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_DISCOUNT_MAX_D.title: Number of days before the discount is calculated from the reservation orders
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_DISCOUNT_MAX_D.description: The orders amde before this number of days won't be taken into account when calculating the discount

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_DISCOUNT_MAX_A.title: Maximum amount to be taken into account when calculating the discount
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_DISCOUNT_MAX_A.description: This is the maximum amount of money to be discounted

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_FILTER_TIME_IN.title: Filter Infobox times to show only the current times
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_FILTER_TIME_IN.description: Filter Infobox times to show only the current times

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_GOOGLE_MAPS_AP.title: Google Maps API Key
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_GOOGLE_MAPS_AP.description: This is the key that google maps gives you for your domain.

EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_GMT.title: Store Timezone
EXTENSION_PAY_PER_RENTALS_GMT.description: GMT Time zone for the store
